1.content:
A boy named Adam stared out the window of a taxi as it drove down the road. Adam was 16, and he was rather bored from the long ride he had been through.

A new dorm was openning for an all-ages private school. The dorm is free, has everything neccessary already provided for its occupants, and co-ed which is why many are trying to get in, including Adam, who will be starting at the private school during the next year. However, as great as it seems, their are two catches:

The first is that in order to stay at the dorm, you have to move into it during June, and stay there all summer as well. For Adam, since he is from out of town, and lacks the means to travel to it freely, this means he has to leave his friends earlier and spend all summer away from them, as well as the school year. He would have to get there during the start of the month.

The second catch is that dorm used to be the house of a very large family that just one day disappeared. There is a rumor that the family still haunts the place, but Adam has never believed in superstition or ghost stories.

However, despite that, he decided to move in without a second thought. The private school was said to be one of the best, so he knew he could get a good education, which was important to him. His taxi pulled up outside of the gate of the dorm, and he unloaded his things. He didn't have much though, since he was an orphan. Just clothes and a few other things.

Pulling his suitcase up to the door, he hit the button for the doorbell, and almost instantly the door opened. The one who answered the door looked to be a middle aged woman. "Hello there. You must be one of the student here to use the dorm."

"Yes ma'am." Adam repplied. "My name is Adam."

"Well then come on in." she said with a smile as she stood aside so that Adam could enter. "You know, you're actually the first one to arrive, though I expect we'll be getting many more arivals over the week. I'm Ms. Sterious, and I'm in charge of the dorm."

Looking around, the entrance area looked really big, and their were two staircases a few feet away from the door. "So can you tell me where the room I'll be staying is?"

"Oh, we're really lenient, so you can have whatever room you want, just so long as it isn't taken. Not that you'll have that problem since you got here first. The place is four stories tall, and all of the rooms on the second, third, and fouth floors. The first floor has facilties such as a living room, a kitchen, and other things."

"Really? That sounds pretty cool." Adam commented.

She then pulled out a sign that had his name on it and handed it to Adam. "Just put this on the door to the room you pick so that others will know its yours." she said, then started to walk away, but then turned around to say one last thing. "Oh, by the way: I'm sorry but none of the rooms have been cleared out of the stuff that used to be in them. Its a big house, so I haven't been able to do it. So whatever is in the room you pick might as well belong to you from now on, so do with them what you wish." Ms. Sterious said as she walked out of the room, and Adam headed upstairs. Looking around, he picked a door close to the stairs, and when he opened it, he found himself standing in the doorway of...

James walked into the room, Aimee a few steps behind him. He was glad she agreed to room with him, the room just didn't feel right with one person. The room was fairly large, near the staircase on the second floor. It was also fairly near the second floor bathroom. The room had two beds, each with a separate closet, desk, boudoir, and bookshelf. Between the two beds were a couch and table, with a large window above the couch.

The closets and desks were still full of the previous occupants clothes and items. James decided to leave their things in the closet, just move them to make room for his own. As he pushed the hangers to one side, he noticed a dark green dress. http://threadsmagazine.assets.tauntonnet... It looked rather beautiful, as did just about everything else in there. As he was looking through the desk when he found half of a picture. It was of a girl with long red hair who James figured must have been one of the previous occupants of the room.

https://img0.etsystatic.com/009/0/561003...
The name "Lily" was written on the back.

Aimee's closet had similar clothes, though she wouldn't be caught dead in a dress or even a skirt. Still, though, she had to admit some of them were very pretty. She found the other half of the picture of the two sisters. How one of them had red hair and the other black she couldn't quite tell.

http://i.imgur.com/Gkf7o.jpg
The name "Raven" was written on the back.
11432211122.title: Switch to James and Aimee

choices: Go see what Aimee is up to
114322111221.content:
James was still putting his things in the desk, leaving the picture of Lily on the desktop. Aimee, in the meantime, had been messing with her hair. She almost always wears her long, black hair in a ponytail, but now she was keeping it down.

"James, I'm going to go have a look around the house." she said.
"Fair enough. I might join you shortly. I'd like to get the feel of the room a bit more."

Aimee headed out, leaving James to himself. He decided to keep looking through Lily's desk and boudoir, trying to find more information on her. After about five minutes of looking at scraps of paper and pencils in the desk drawers, he finally found something promising in one of the bottom drawers. It was a small wooden lever built into the side of the drawer. James pulled it and a hidden compartment under the top of the desk. Reaching under, James pulled a thick book from the compartment. The book was in surprisingly good shape; James had thought that anything left by Lily would be rather old since he figured she must have left the house a long time ago. But this book suggested that she might have been living here much more recently.

Opening the book's front cover, James found a large monogram letter L. This must have been Lily's diary. A quick glance at the first few pages confirmed this. Apparently Lily had been keeping this diary from the first day she could write, which must have been when she was quite young. Tucked into one of the first few pages was a photograph of Lily. It must have been taken at about the same time as the picture on the desk. The photo in the book was of Lily sitting on her bed reading a book. Her legs were crossed at the knee and her chin was resting on her hands, with the book sitting in her lap. It was hard to see, but James was pretty sure she was reading a collection of poems. James set the photo aside, and started reading through the first few pages. He was sitting on the bed reading. His legs were crossed at the knee and his chin was resting on his hands, with the book sitting in his lap.
114322111221.title: Continue with James and Aimee

1143221112211.content:
The first several pages were nothing special, mostly relating Lily's childhood life. The entries were sparse and didn't have much of interest. There was one story from when Lily was about eight. Apparently she, her sister Raven, and their cousin Karly, who used to live three doors down the hall, were out playing at a nearby lake. The three girls had been swimming for a few hours when Lily tricked Karly into jumping from the High Rock (yes, that's what they called it.) The drop was so far that when Karly hit the water, the top of her swimsuit went flying. Lily and Raven laughed for an hour.

James put the book aside, deciding to keep looking around the room. The few other pictures of Lily he could find showed that she almost always had long red hair with that beautiful braid. A few more minutes of searching turned up a rather strange wig. It looked identical like it was made to match Lily's hair exactly. Almost absentmindedly, James put the wig on. It actually made him look rather like Lily.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/736...

"Aimee will laugh her head off when she sees this. Just like that time we made Karly's swimsuit fly off!"

James had a good laugh at the memory, and it took a few seconds to remember that that was Lily and Raven who did that, not James and Aimee.

Must just be Lily's writing, it's very immersive.

James decided he should have a walk around the house as well, dinner would be soon and it would be good to stretch his legs. He opened his suitcase to get some fresh socks when he noticed a pair of stockings sitting in Lily's closet (he should really start calling it "his" closet.) He walked over to them, they were white with a rather pretty design.

http://www.corset-story.com/media/catalo...

He decided to put them on, since they were already out and he didn't have to sort through his suitcase to find socks. His pants would hide them anyway, but he wasn't sure why he needed to hide them.

going to the main kitchen you see a few other people there as well, you introduce yourself.

One girl, Amy says hi and then tells you that theres gonna be a party/get together tonight in the common room, and that for fun everyone is going to dress in the clothes left in their room.

You're a bit put off, not sure you want to dress like a teenage girl, especially in front of a bunch of strangers.

She sees the hesitation

"don't worry about it, everybody somehow ended up in weird rooms, me and my roomate are in a room with a mother and baby daughter, we flipped a coin, I'm the baby, My friend got a little boys room, I'm sure somebody else thats a guy will be dressed as a girl, please come, it'll be fun"

You agree, she tells you they're starting in two hours, so you should start getting ready, and she says "don't worry about looking perfect, this is for fun, but as for me, I'm going all out, so you can too if you want.

You head back to your room, looking through the dressers and closet, you find anything from girls jeans and T-shirts to skirts dresses and girly tops, in one section theres makeup, and for shoes, theres every type you can imagine, tennis shoes, girls flats, low heels, medium heels and pretty high heels. You just have to decide if you just want to do it and get it over with, wear the most masuline stuff you can find, or really go all out

1151.content:
That Amy girl was pretty cute, and after she told you she was going to go all out for her outfit it didn't seem like a lot of others would, she'd definitely be happy if you went all out too, who knows, maybe dressing like a girl would be the thing that got you a girlfriend, that'd be ironic.

you begin to browse through the girls clothes in the closet, you want to pick the girliest thing you can find to do this well. Browsing through the closet you find what seems to be a halloween costume, a sexy school girl, putting that aside, there's a prom dress, which would work, but you want to look like a normal teenage girl, so you put that aside, you find a denim mini-skirt, "perfect"

you continue browsing, girly T-shirts, aren't good enough, a few plain tank tops, finally finding a dress-like top thats really feminine, but somehow you realize that it doesn't go well with the denim skirt, you settle on a white long sleeve top, with the words glamorous with hearts and stars around it, you set it beside the skirt, next is underwear, then shoes.

You can't wear your boxers under the mini skirt so you pick the first pair of panties available, same with the bra, making sure its white so it doesnt show through the white top. finally you take a pair of what look like 3 inch heels, after comparing them to the skirt, the lower heels didn't look good, so you settled on the 3 inch

Before changing you decide to paint your nails, pink is the obvious choice, you do your toes first for practice, then move onto your fingers, they're not perfect, but not bad either.

You look at your legs and sigh, you have more to do, you need to shave your legs, luckily you started so early to give you time, you look online for some techniques on how to shave legs and find a few good tips and proceed to take a shower, slowly shaving your legs in there.

You use the feminine body wash and shampoo and conditioner.

After getting out of the shower you run your hand down your legs, your impressed how good a job you did, it wasn't even that hard. You proceed to put on the panties, situating your crotch to give a smooth front, then slide the skirt up your legs, you didnt realize just how short it was, it doesnt even make it to your knees, it'll be so easy to accidentally flash your panties, how do girls where skirts this short.

you struggle to get the bra on before giving up and clipping it first then slipping it on like a shirt, you put two socks in each cup to fill it, then slipping the White top on over it.

Looking in the mirror you can honestly say that your body passes pretty well for a girl, your head on the other hand doesn't, you still need to get makeup done well.

You know a girl moved into the room next to yours, so you quickly slip out and knock on her door, not really ready to be seen like this just yet.

She answers, wearing a thin wife beater, but with a bra underneath and baggy jeans, you can tell shes wearing makeup too, guess shes not going as all out as you are. You both have the same reaction

"so you're going to this party thing too?" she says first

"uhh he he yeah... thats why I'm here... I wanted to really go all out... just for fun you know, but... I can't do my makeup, do you think you could help me out?

oh, uh yeah sure why not, I'm finished getting ready anyways, as you can see I was kind of lax with my clothes, I couldn't not wear a bra with this grungy shirt. but you look pretty good so far, good job." she says as you lead her back to your room.

She sits you in front of the makeup table and goes to work.

A few minutes later shes finished it looks great, but shes not done she starts on your hair, its not too long so she curls it.

Almost half an hour later shes done with your hair instead of the shaggy look you usually have now its tight and bouncy on your head, not to mention feminine.

"there, ya go, looks great, see you out there, I'm heading out." she says.

You get up, examining your made up face, you barely recognize yourself, and you hate to admit it to yourself but you love your hair like this.

but you dismiss the thought, not wanting to be late you slip on your shoes, a pair of 3 inch heels, and miraculously don't have any trouble walking in them at all, you'd always imagined them to be hard to walk in but you gracefully take each step without a problem, you must be channeling your inner teenage girl, you joke to yourself.

You head out and into the common room, spotting a purse as you leave your room grabbing it, even though its empty
1151.title: Go All out

Nervous, knowing your about to meet a bunch of people dressed like a teen girl you walk into the common area where your nervousness mostly subsides, everyone else here is doing the same thing, though not all are dressed like teenage girls, and most havent gone to the extent you have, but a few did.

"I love that you went all out, you look so good its amazing, almost like you do this often."

You laugh, "Nope, Scouts honor, first time I've dressed like this. I just decided to go all out for fun."

"Well before you crossed your legs I caught a glimpse up your skirt, your even wearing panties, that's commitment.

You blush, "Yeah like I said, I went all out"

For the rest of the party you and Alexa, you learned her name was, talked and laughed, you learned you had a lot in common.

As the party was wrapping up, Alexa said.

"Hey, if you're not doing anything later, you should come over and we can hang our or whatever"

"Sure" You respond, "only been here a day, no time to make any plans, I'll probably be back in normal clothes though" You laugh

"you wear whatever you want." she gets up and heads out.

You start to leave a few minutes later, passing Amy and her roommate as you go

"I'd be happy to babysit if you ever need me too" You joke to Amy's roommate.

"Ha" she laughs "I'm not sure you can handle her, she can be a handle at times." Amy sticks her tongue out as she hears this.

You head back to your room, you were gonna hang out with Alexa in an hour should you change out of this, or meet up with her as a girl.

151.content:
Adam walked into the first room he found on the second floor. Opening the door he imediatley noticed that it was obviously a room that belonged to a young women. Walking in he thought that the girl must have been about 21 years in age, and judging by some of the picture that were hung on the wall, she must have been a model. He was somewhat aprehensive about staying in someone elses room, and didn't like the thought of living in this womens personal space. The room was quite large and was full of items from around the world. "Places that she must have worked in" he thought. Opposite of a large bay window was a large walk in closet. Adam opened the door and couldn't believe the amount of clothes and shoes that this person had. He dropped his duffle bag in the closet and continued to look around the room. On the wall as a large bouqet of roses that had dried, a not tied to a string had a little message from what appear to be her boyfriend. The note was addressed to a girl named Megan, "So that must be the name of the girl." Adam said outloud, even though he was the only person in the room.

Megan was gourgeous, she had long black hair and judging by some of the pictures and clothes in the closet she must be 5'10", an inch shorter that Adam. He was back in the closet and looking for space to unpack. This was somewhat difficult because of the amount of clothes Megan had. He opened a drawer that was full of panties and bras, he puched what he could to the side and found enough room for his underwear. He grabbed one of Megan's bra's and looked for a size. The tag said that she was C cup. He then found a few empty hangers for his dressier clothes and the rest of his wardrobe would be left on the floor infront of the giant display of Megans shoes.

Adam looked at the shoes and noticed that most of them had really high heels, and really fashionable. On the bottom shelf were over 20 pairs of boots. He gabbed one of the boots and held it up to look at. He really liked the height of the heel and how clean the black leather looked. He was thinking that he needed to try it on, when he shook his head in disbelief as he had never ever had a thought or notion to try on womens clothes. He put the boot back on the shelf and walked out before he gave in to temptation.


He closed the door and desided he better have a nap before the other arrived

Adam tossed from side to side in Megan's bed. He was above the sheets and fully clothed. He was having trouble getting comfortable and the thoughts of Megan's shoes kept poping up in his head. In his mind he had already begun to picture himself wearing her shoes. During the few short moments that he was actually asleep, Adam had a dream were he was wearing a pair of Megan 4" Louibotoun heels. In his dream he had walked into the kitchen of his new home and was talking to the other house mates. Most of them complimenting him on his shoes. In his dream he was about to talk to Heather about his shoes when he woke up and opened his eyes.

He sat up on the edge of the bed, looking at the ground and recalling his dream and wondering why he would be dreaming of such a thing. He quickly brushed the thought aside and walked over to the bathroom to splash some water on his face. Adam smiled back at himself throught the mirror and started to chuckle about his dream and how odd it was for him to be dreaming of such thoughts. "It must be because I think Megan is hot, would love to be with her". Adam said to himself still looking into the mirror. After drying his face, we walked over to a chair that was in the bay window and took off his socks. A pair of grey wool socks that we really bulky and too warm for the temperature of the room. He rolled them up in a ball and walked over to the closet to put them in drawer besides Megan socks and Nylons. He found a pair of knee high black stockings of megans and thought that they were probably cooler than his socks so he put them on while staring at the wall of shoes in front of him.

Adam was having a hard time controlling his thoughts, he was seeing images of himself in his mind, situations or former occurances were the shoes he was wearing were womens shoes. He remembered that yesterday was he was riding the bus to town he wasn't wearing his sneakers, we was wearing a pair black ballet flats, As he regain focus he saw the same ballet flats on the 3rd shelve. Thinking that this was to wierd, he grabbed them thinking that there is no way that they would fit his feet. "Wow", he thought, not only do they fit my feet perfectly I can actually recall the store in New York that I purchased them." Adam was dumbfounded, and really confused. He slipped the flats off his feet and looked for another pair of shoes that would not fit his feet and in no way would he ever be caught in. Being a young hetrosexual man with no crossdressing tendancies, Adam was trying to find a logical reason for his thoughts. He found the pair of Louibotons that was in his dream. They had a 1" platform and a 5" inch heel. Inside the heel he say the Louiboton logo and the word Alti stamped in golf leaf. http://www4.images.coolspotters.com/phot...

The shoes fit like a glove. Adam was still wearing Megan's black knee high tights and couldn't believe how good these shoes felt on his feet. He walked over to the closest mirror, to his surprise he was having no problem walking in 5" heels. He found himself stepping one foot directly in front of the other, similar to what he saw in fashions shoes that his sister would wathc on tv. Looking back at him in the full length mirror was a regular male, but as his eyes began to look down he saw the shoes, and a very femine pose. He was standing with his weight on one shoe as the other was tilted up and his ankle was bent towards his other leg. This almost sent Adam to the floor. What even made it worse was a picture he saw of Megan, standing with the exact same pose from the waist down. Still confused by how good the shoes felt and how easy it was to walk in them, Adam sat down to consider his next move.

Not with how they fit, because they fit like they were made for him, but comfotable with the thought of him actually wearing women's shoes. Through out the room was pictures and nick nacks of items Megan collected as she toured the world on modelling asignments. By the look of the room and the items that Adam saw, Megan was a very mature 21 year old.

As he returned the shoe he began to look through the other items in the huge closet. Megan had alot of skirts and dresses and her favorite pairs of jeans. Not to mention lots of accessories. Scarves, hat, jewllery and purses. "Must be the benefits of working as a model", Adam thought to himself. He grabbed some silver bangles and without thinking he slid them on his arm.

Feeling the urge to wear another pair of shoes he found the boots on the bottom shelf very appealing and saw a pair of flat knee high black leather boot that he wondered what they would feel like. Sitting down he had no trouble putting them on as they again seemed made for him. He did find it hard to tuck in his pant leg as the boots were made to wear outside the pant leg. Thinking that this might be a problem and that he might have to try on another pair, his eyes looked over at the many pairs of Megans jeans and wondered if he should try on a pair so that the boots could be worn properly. He thumbed through the 20 - 30 pairs of jeans that Megan had collected. Different colours, different styles, and different lenths is what Adam found. He settled on a pair of faded blue skinny leg jean that would make it easier for him to zip up the shaft of the boot. When he zipped up the front of the jean he discovered that the jean were also low risers and caused another problem, because of the boxer shorts that he wore. Without a moment of hesitation Adam walked over to the dresser drawer and found a pair of black boy cut panties and slid them up his leg so that he could continue to get dressed. In his mind he was getting dressed in order to go down stairs and meet some of the other housemates. He slid on the boots and zipped them up and went over to the mirror to have a final look. He was wearing a green t-shirt up top and he was all Megan below. The jeans were tight, but shaped his legs somewhat to make them look long and lean. The boots looked great but he thought that maybe they are too girly and he should instead go with the black ballet flats instead.

Adam walked out of the room wearing Megans' jeans and shoes. His ankles exposed as the jean only went down to his ankle and making his choice of footwear very visible.

info.brief_description: People stay in a house where they start to act like the last person who used their room
info.description:
Main character's name is Adam, but you may add as many characters you want, can focus on any character at any time.

Ms. Sterious is the nice woman in charge of the dorm. As her name implies, shes very mysterious, though no one ever seems to notice what word her name sounds like. Another peculiar thing about her is that despite running the dorm, she is rarely ever seen, and that unless she is around, everyone seems to forget that she exists.

GUIDELINES:
The first room that a person opens the door to, you will feel compelled to just use it, regardless of what it looks like.
Each day, they will slowly start to act more and more like the person the room belonged to, regarless of whether the current occupant and the previous one are of different genders. This happens very gradually and slowly, so don't make the changes happen to rapidly.
As days go by, the stuff in the room will slowly start to change as if they were meant for the new occupant, but they will not notice. Ex: Clothes will start to alter in size to fit the occupant of the room.
If the room belonged to multiple people(like parents, or twins, etc), then they will feel compelled to share the room with someone else, and will invite someone to share with them, who will accept the offer.
If the the room belonged to people who were together, such as married, they will ask a member of the opposite sex who they have invited to share your large room with. Ex: If a guy picks a room for married parents, the girl he invites can be a girlfriend, a girl he has a crush, or just a friend. Same rules apply, with the character starting to act like the person whose stuff they touch first, with their roommate acting like their partner.
If the occupants were twins, they will invite someone depending on the gender of the previous occupants. If both were the same gender, they will invite a member of the same gender, and if they were different genders, they will invite someone of an opposite sex. If not twins, they will invite anyone. Same rules apply, with the character starting to act like the person whose stuff they touch first, with their roommate acting like their partner.
Relationships between the occupants will start to mirror those whose rooms they use. Ex: Two people who use the rooms of a brother and sister who never got along will start to not get along themselves.
No one will be aware of the changes that happen to them. Same goes for the other occupants of the dorm, and even those who don't stay there. Everything will seem perfectly normal about what happens.
For Adam at least, always leave at least a "Something else" option before he picks a room. Leave many different possibilities open. It was a large extended family, so their were many brothers, sisters, parents, aunts, uncles, cousins, etc staying there, so there are plenty of options. Even the ones that have already been done can be used again if you want.


Be creative with the guidlines I have provided.

Additional rules:
No physical transformations. Only mental.
No sex
No killing off characters
No skipping ahead days
No ending the story
And most importantly, have fun!
